nodes.text: Batuu Brew was a beverage available in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. During the Clone Wars, the cantina's bartender Janott listed the drink amongst those available to the human Senator Padmé Amidala when she visited the cantina.
Batuu Brew was first mentioned in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
